name: Parinya Punpongsanon
content: Parinya Punpongsanon Search Parinya Punpongsanon, Ph.D Associate Professor at Graduate School of Science and Engineering, Saitama University. Principal Investigator of Fabrication, Interaction, and Perception Laboratory. Office Graduate School of Science and Engineering, Building for Research and Project, 7F, Room 703. 255 Shimo-Okubo, Sakura-ku, Saitama 338-8570, Japan Email parinya [at] mail.saitama-u.ac.jp Research Focus Extended Reality, Human Perception, Digital Fabrication, Computational Interaction Research Projects * All XR Human Perception Fabrication Unobtrusive Edible Tags using Food 3D Printing Presented at ACM UIST 2022 (Paper, Demonstration) Keyword Fabrication Enhancing Asynchronous Shared-Space Demonstrations with Spatial-temporal Assistive Toolsets for Effective Learning in Immersive Virtual Laboratories Presented at ACM SUI 2021 (Poster), ACM CSCW 2022 (Published at ACM PHCI 2022) Best Poster Award Keyword XR, Virtual Laboratory AI-generated Characters for Supporting Personalized Learning and Well-being Year 2020 -
